extendedInfo.description: A Parents' Choice Award winner!**REVIEWER COMMENTS*** a PERFECT APP for toddlers and pre-schoolers - familyfriendlyvideogames.com* a DELIGHTFUL little app - 5 stars out of 5 - commonsensemedia.org* SETS THE STANDARD for what all childrenâs apps should be - geekasms.com* one of the NICEST apps I've seeen - lunchboxreviews.com* one of my FAVORITE apps for kids - kiboomu.com* Zoo Train has five different activities and each one is A WINNER. - theiphonemom.com* sure to be A HIT with toddlers through kindergarten-aged kids. - iphoneandkids.com**FAN COMMENTS*** "My kids LOVE this app."* "...this app is awesome."* "Best Preschool App Ever... my 2 yr old daughter has learned so much"A fun & educational bundle of games for toddlers and preschoolers featuring two kid favorites: animals and trains! Kids enjoy learning as they play the 5 different games plus a bonus sticker activity. With fun, playful illustrations and animations, original music, and intuitive game play that has been thoroughly kid-tested.---------------------------------------Watch the Zoo Train demo:http://bit.ly/zootraindemo---------------------------------------FEATURES- 5 games teach alphabet & letters, word construction, musical scale & note recognition, matching patterns & recognizing shapes- A reward-based sticker activity to keep kids motivated as they learn- A variety of colorful & playful animals & trains- Fun music & sound effects throughout the games- Friendly vocal reinforcement of words & letters- Positive encouragement after correct answers & completed puzzles- Easy & intuitive interface that doesnât require instruction- Random game play keeps your child engagedINCLUDED GAMES & ACTIVITIES1. Picture Puzzles: drag the pieces to complete the image, then hear the picture identified and watch your train move closer towards the station2. Whistle Music: Play a song on the full-octave train whistles as a freeplay activity, OR listen, watch and play along to any of the included songs3. Train Builder: Choose your engine, cargo and caboose, then select the setting where your train should ride â then watch your custom animation4. Word Builder: Match the letters to create a word. Youâre rewarded with a whistle toot and vocal reinforcement of the word you just created5. Track Tycoon: Drag the missing train track pieces to finish the track, then watch as the train rides along the completed path6. Stickers: Stick a sticker on your suitcase as you earn your rewards â see how many you can collect!***QUESTIONS? CONCERNS?***We have no way to contact you via a review - if you have any issues or questions, please contact us at preschoolgames@busybeestudios.com!Become a fan on Facebook:http://on.fb.me/busybeefacebookPlease help us to keep improving the game! Send feedback, comments and suggestions to: preschoolgames@busybeestudios.comHave a support question? Visit us here: http://www.busybeestudios.com/games/faq.html***PRIVACY AND SAFETY***This app contains NO ads, in-app purchases, push notifications, tracking, or any data collection whatsoever.This app does contain a link to our website for more information, but is found only in one contained Parent screen which is separate from the game play screens.Busy Bee Studios is a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families.

reviews.title: Sully
reviews.comment: I really like this when im not home and there is not signal I just let my baby play this and she love it.\342\231\241
reviews.author: sulenny palaguachi

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: My 2 year old loves this app! We recently went on a long road trip, and this is the only thing that kept him happy. He spells things out now and can do puzzles faster than children twice his age. Can\'t wait for more apps for android by this developer.
reviews.author: Jennifer League

reviews.title: My son likes it
reviews.comment: My son has 3 years and seems to like it. Until now 5 stars. :)
reviews.author: Florin Vasilescu

reviews.title: zoo train
reviews.comment: my son found out about app on YouTube thought it would be good for him but it keeps freezing and crashing, will there be a bug fix for the Samsung galaxy s2 soon
reviews.author: Claire Lehane

reviews.title: My kid loves this game
reviews.comment: We also found this game through YouTube. Seems like a great promotional channel for your game!  My 23 months old loves the part where you put a sticker on the suitcase. \"ONLY ONE STICKER!\" I had to tell him every time, until the little cheat discovered he can pick up two stickers simultaneously using both fingers. Now he smiles proudly every time he gets the \"extra\" sticker :-)
reviews.author: Sebastian Lambinon

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: My two year old lad loves it he first saw the game on youtube looked on play store and purchase the game prefect for him so many games and nursery rhymes can\'t go wrong
reviews.author: Adrianne Taylor

reviews.title: Crushing on galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Keeps crushing and freezes on galaxy s2, fix please!!!!! UPDATE 14.05.2013 STILL THE SAME PROBLEM FIX IT SOON OR GIVE MY MONEY BACK!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Ivan Belu\305\241kov

reviews.title: Not compatible
reviews.comment: Edit: Changed from 3 to 5 stars. Dev actually responds and fixed the issue. My daughter can enjoy it again now.  Bought it, installed on Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 and everything is just fine until I flash CM 10.1 and now it says incompatible.
reviews.author: Leonardus Setyabudi

reviews.comment: My boy is almost two and he can\'t stop playing with this. Everything from building train tracks to matching letters to spell basic words. Excellent app.
reviews.author: Kilo Pang

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Brilliant and well conceived app for kids. Had been waiting for the android version ever since my daughter started loving the YouTube video of the iOS version
reviews.author: Vijay Rao

reviews.title: Best Toddler App out there
reviews.comment: We came to know about the app via a youtube video. Both my kids (5 and 2 year old) loved the video. Put this app on my phone. Best $1 ever spent on kiddie stuff. So much content to play. Kids love it.
reviews.author: Ashish Gupta

reviews.title: Beautiful app for kids
reviews.comment: Excellent app, my kid just loves this. Keeps him occupied. The best part is the app needs no permissions and hs no links or other gimmicks inside the app. Totally worth the money.
reviews.author: Karthik Krishnapuram

reviews.title: Great education game
reviews.comment: My daughter loves trains so she loves building words on a the train

reviews.comment: Good app but unable to install on my tab

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Easy to handle, good for learning, great game for kids!! :) Thank You!
reviews.author: P\303\241l Maszlik

reviews.title: Small improvements needed
reviews.comment: Back button needs to work properly instead of closing the app down, this is really confusing for me, maybe my kid doesn\'t care! Need to be able to move to SD as my phone is tiny and short on space. Probably not worth the price currently being charged.
reviews.author: George Lund

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great for our young kids without adds or internet extras.
